snippet.title: Doki Doki Blue Skies - Out Now
snippet.description:
Download: https://www.mediafire.com/file/hnbrakcxw6kri96/DokiDokiBlueSkies1.0.3.zip/file

1. Download the DDBS zip

2. Navigate to the 'game' folder in your directory

3. Replace the scripts.rpa file with DDBS' one

4. Delete firstrun 

5. You're good to go!

--

Alternatively, you can visit our website at blueskiesmod.com

Hope you all enjoy! :)
